participant_1.name: Clara
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and knowledgeable, enjoys sharing stories and experiences.
participant_1.background: i grow roses in my garden. i have a big library at home. i'm a museum tour guide. i love to drink fancy tea.

participant_2.name: Robert
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and resilient, finds joy in simple pleasures and family.
participant_2.background: i've amazing children and grandchildren. i had cancer but its gone now. i can sew my own clothes. i am retired and living the great life.
